Amumu.name: Amumu

runesets.label: Solo Frontline
runesets.explanation: Build Visage before Gauntlet if 3+ AP or a fed AP threat. Randuin's for armor, Sterak's for tenacity—Overlord's is very strong. Kaenic Rookern vs heavy AP, Redemption counters Amumu R well.

runesets.label: Damage Follow Up
runesets.explanation: Aftershock and tank runes make you much harder to kill in teamfights and tower dives. Font of Life and Overgrowth provide extra sustain and scaling. Triumph and Legend: Haste from Precision secondary give you clutch healing and more spell casts. Use this setup when you need to frontline or survive heavy burst.

tips: - Volibear is much stronger than Amumu early (pre-6). Abuse your faster clear and look for early fights or dragons.
- Merc Treads are crucial to reduce Amumu's CC.
- Take 3 points in Q before maxing W for easier trades.
- You can buffer W through Amumu's CC—cast it as you're being hit.
- Use R or Q to escape Amumu's ult or reposition in fights.
- In mid game, invade when enemy laners can't rotate. Extended fights favor you if you land multiple Ws.
- Deny Amumu's engage with Q, but don't overextend and get ulted solo.
- Only fight in your vision—use control wards and sweepers to avoid getting picked.
- In late game 5v5s, avoid straight teamfights. Look for skirmishes and play side lanes where you can outplay.

runesets.explanation: Build Visage before Gauntlet if 3+ AP or a fed AP threat. Randuin's for armor, Sterak's for tenacity—Overlord's is very strong. Kaenic Rookern vs heavy AP, Redemption counters Amumu R well.
